content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.wireless_apps_pic32cxbz2_wbz45_peripheral_trp_uart_codedPhy
content.displayName: BLE Peripheral Transparent UART Application with coded PHY
content.shortDescription: This example application enables user to create a peripheral device and send/receive characters between 2 connected BLE devices over Microchip proprietary Transparent UART Profile with coded PHY which enables much wider range between 2 devices. Peripheral device will be WBZ45x Device and Central device should be WBZ45x Device with coded PHY enabled as well.
content.author: Microchip
